aliu418.shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • aliu418.shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Rectangle, RegularPolygon

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    aliu418

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y,
             java.awt.Color strokeColor,
             java.awt.Color fillColor,
             int strokeWidth)
        Creates new instance with coordinates at x, y and sets values for stroke and fill.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the Shape object.
        y - The y-coordinate of the Shape object.
        strokeColor - The color of the lines outlining the shape.
        fillColor - The color of the inside of the shape.
        strokeWidth - The width of the lines outlining the shape.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws a shape object on the screen with a specified stroke color, stroke width, and fill color.
        Parameters:
        drawer - The PApplet instance used to draw the object on the screen.
        Precondition:
        Any fill or stroke modifications will not affect the drawing., Setting the fill color to null with result in no fill for the shape.
        Postcondition:
        stroke, fill and strokeWeight properties of the drawer object will be set to however the shape turns out.

      • getArea

        public abstract double getArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the shape.
        Returns:
        The area of the shape.

      • getPerimeter

        public abstract double getPerimeter()
        Calculates and returns the perimeter of the Shape object.
        Returns:
        The perimeter of the shape.

      • translate

        public void translate(double x,
                      double y)
        Moves the shape a certain horizontal and vertical distance.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal distance that the shape moves.
        y - The vertical distance that the shape moves.

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside(double x,
                                      double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this shape.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the tested point.
        y - The y-coordinate of the tested point.
        Returns:
        A boolean signifying whether the tested point is inside the shape or not.

        public void move(double x,
                 double y)
        Sets the x- and y-coordinates to a new specified x and y value.
        Parameters:
        x - The new x-coordinate of the shape.
        y - The new y-coordinate of the shape.
